00113 
00114 HomeWidget* HomeWidget::Instance( WContainerWidget* parent)
00115 {
00116   if( parent == 0 ){
00117     if ( !instance_ ){
00118       // we didn't receive a parent and there is no instance of HomeWidget, so return NULL..
00119       return NULL;
00120     }
00121   }
00122   else{                         // We received a parent container
00123     if( !instance_ ){
00124       instance_ = new HomeWidget(parent); // No instance of HomeWidget, lets create one.
00125     }
00126     // else don't care, we already have an instance we will return that.
00127   }
00128   return instance_;
00129 
00130 }

00133 static std::string pci_ids_file = "/tmp/pci.ids";
00134 
00135 /*
00136   Global function from pci_ids/pci_ids.cc to update PCI IDs in database,
00137   gets 'pci.ids' file as parameter.
00138 */
00140 int update_pci_ids(std::string pci_ids_file);

00144 void HomeWidget::bPciIds_Click()
00145 {
00146   // Change server busy indicator.
00147   Wt::WApplication::instance()->setLoadingIndicator( loading_ = new Wt::WOverlayLoadingIndicator() );
00148   loading_->setMessage("Updating..");
00149   
00150 
00151   /*
00152    * Set the download command appropriately depending on proxy address existance.
00153    * @{
00154    */
00155   std::string download_command;
00156   if( settingsProxy_ != "" )
00157     download_command =
00158       "curl http://pciids.sourceforge.net/v2.2/pci.ids --proxy "+ settingsProxy_ +" > " + pci_ids_file;
00159   else
00160     download_command =
00161       "curl http://pciids.sourceforge.net/v2.2/pci.ids > " + pci_ids_file;
00162   /*
00163    * @}
00164    */
00165   
00166 
00167   if( system( download_command.c_str()  ) == 0 ){       // Try to download the 'pci.ids' file from net.
00168     dialogDownload_ = new WDialog("PCI IDs Download");
00169     new WText("Downloaded pci.ids file! <br />"
00170               "Now We will update the PCI IDs database", dialogDownload_->contents() );
00171     new WBreak( dialogDownload_->contents() );
00172     WPushButton* dialogDownloadOk = new WPushButton("Ok", dialogDownload_->contents() );
00173 
00174     // Sets WDialog::DialogCode to Accepted if OK is clicked.
00175     dialogDownloadOk->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogDownload_, WDialog::accept) );
00176     
00177     WPushButton* dialogDownloadCancel = new WPushButton("Cancel", dialogDownload_->contents() );
00178 
00179     // Sets WDialog::DialogCode to Rejected if Cancel is clicked.
00180     dialogDownloadCancel->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogDownload_, WDialog::reject) );
00181     dialogDownload_->show();
00182   }
00183   else {                                                // 'pci.ids' Download failed!
00184     dialogDownload_ = new WDialog("PCI IDs Download");
00185     new WText("Failed to download pci.ids!!<br />"
00186               "Check proxy settings..", dialogDownload_->contents() );
00187     new WBreak( dialogDownload_->contents() );
00188     WPushButton* dialogDownloadFail = new WPushButton("Close", dialogDownload_->contents() );
00189 
00190     // Sets WDialog::DialogCode to Rejected when Close is clicked.
00191     dialogDownloadFail->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogDownload_, WDialog::reject) );
00192     dialogDownload_->show();
00193   }
00194 
00195   // Trigger 'dialogDownload_Close' function on 'dialogDownload_' dialog window close.
00196   dialogDownload_->finished().connect(this, &HomeWidget::dialogDownload_Close);
00197 
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 void HomeWidget::dialogDownload_Close( WDialog::DialogCode code )
00202 {
00203   if ( code == WDialog::Accepted ){     // if download is successful and user not rejected update.
00204     dialogPciIds_ = new WDialog("PCI IDs Update");
00205   
00206     if( update_pci_ids( pci_ids_file ) == 0 ){      // Try to update PCI IDs.
00207       new WText("PCI IDs succesfully updated!", dialogPciIds_->contents() );
00208       new WBreak( dialogPciIds_->contents() );
00209       WPushButton* dialogPciIdsOk = new WPushButton("Ok", dialogPciIds_->contents());
00210 
00211       (*dialogPciIdsOk).clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogPciIds_, WDialog::accept) );
00212 
00213       dialogPciIds_->show();
00214     }
00215     else{                                           // PCI IDs update FAILED.
00216       new WText("FAILED to update PCI IDs!!", dialogPciIds_->contents() );
00217       new WBreak( dialogPciIds_->contents() );
00218       WPushButton* dialogPciIdsFail = new WPushButton("Close", dialogPciIds_->contents());
00219 
00220       (*dialogPciIdsFail).clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogPciIds_, WDialog::reject) );
00221     
00222       dialogPciIds_->show();
00223     }
00224     dialogPciIds_->finished().connect(this, &HomeWidget::dialogPci_Close);
00225   }
00226 
00227   // revert back the server busy indicator to its default.
00228   WApplication::instance()->setLoadingIndicator( new WDefaultLoadingIndicator() );
00229 
00230   delete dialogDownload_;
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 void HomeWidget::dialogPci_Close( WDialog::DialogCode code )
00235 {
00236   delete dialogPciIds_;
00237 }
00238 
00239 void HomeWidget::changeProxy()
00240 {
00241   settingsProxy_ = editProxy_->text().narrow(); // Put the given proxy by user into settingsProxy_ variable.
00242   
00243   std::string save_command = "echo "+ settingsProxy_ +" > /tmp/proxy.harix"; // Command string to save proxy.
00244   
00245   if( system( save_command.c_str()  ) != 0 ){   // Try to store the proxy address in server for later use.
00246     // Warn in case of save failure! Proxy address couldn't be saved in file.
00247     dialogWarn_ = new WDialog("Proxy Configuration");
00248     new WText("Oops we failed to save file /tmp/proxy.harix!! <br /> "
00249               "Proxy settings will be valid only for the current session!", dialogWarn_->contents() );
00250     new WBreak( dialogWarn_->contents() );
00251     WPushButton* dialogWarnFail = new WPushButton("Close", dialogWarn_->contents() );
00252     dialogWarnFail->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogWarn_, WDialog::reject) );
00253     dialogWarn_->show();
00254     dialogWarn_->finished().connect(this, &HomeWidget::dialogWarn_Close);
00255   }
00256 
00257 }
00258 
00259 void HomeWidget::dialogWarn_Close( Wt::WDialog::DialogCode code )
00260 {
00261   delete dialogWarn_;
00262 }
00263 
00264 void HomeWidget::readProxyFile()
00265 {
00266   std::ifstream proxy_file( "/tmp/proxy.harix" );
00267   getline( proxy_file, settingsProxy_ ); // read previously stored proxy address into settingsProxy_ variable.
00268 }
